#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define lim 100000
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define INF 1e18
ll n,m;
ll a[501][501],ans[501][501];
ll getans( ll i,ll j)
{    if(i==n+1)
        return 0;
      if(j<1||j>m)
        return INF;
      
    if(ans[i][j]!=INF)
        return ans[i][j];
      ans[i][j]=min(ans[i][j],a[i][j]+getans(i+1,j-1));
      ans[i][j]=min(ans[i][j],a[i][j]+getans(i+1,j));
      ans[i][j]=min(ans[i][j],a[i][j]+getans(i+1,j+1));
      return ans[i][j];
}

int main()
{ 
   // freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
     ll t;
     ll tt;
     
     cin>>tt;
     while(tt--)
     {
        cin>>t;
        cin>>n>>m;
        
        for(ll i=1;i<=n;i++)
            for(ll j=1;j<=m;j++)
            {
                ans[i][j]=INF;
                cin>>a[i][j];
            }
            ll mn=INF;
            for(ll i=1;i<=m;i++)
            {
                
                mn=min(mn,getans(1LL,i));
            }
            if(mn>=t)
                cout<<"NO"<<endl;
            else cout<<"YES"<<endl;

     }


}
